exercise.name: PLANK EXERCISE
exercise.description: The plank is an isometric core strength exercise that involves maintaining a position similar to a push-up for the maximum possible time.

exercise.name: SEATED ABS CIRCLE
exercise.description: Seated abs circle is basically sitting on a mat, raising your legs and moving them in circles clockwise and counter clock wise

exercise.name: SQUAT KICK
exercise.description: The squat side kick is a dynamic variation of the bodyweight squat with an additional lateral movement.

exercise.name: INCH WORM
exercise.description: Inch worm is a multi-joint exercise that targets the muscles of your anterior chain while stretching the muscles of your posterior chain.

exercise.name: JUMPING JACK
exercise.description: Jumping jack is a physical jumping exercise that targets muscles throughout your arms, legs and core

exercise.name: JUMP SQUAT
exercise.description: Jump squats are a high-intensity plyometric exercise that are excellent for building explosive power, conditioning the muscles and joints of the lower body and increasing the height of your vertical jump.

exercise.name: STEP UP ON CHAIR
exercise.description: Step-up onto the chair is an exercise for balance and improving the strength of your lower body, quadriceps, glutes, and the hamstring.

exercise.name: REVERSE CRUNCHES
exercise.description: The crunch is an abdominal exercise that target the lower part of your abs.

exercise.name: LUNGE
exercise.description: Lunge is an exercise that targets the quadriceps in your thighs and the glutes in your hips and butt.

exercise.name: SHOULDER STRETCH
exercise.description: Shoulder stretch focuses on stretching the triceps and upper chest area. It helps improve flexibility and range of motion in your shoulder muscles.
